remarks: Fourier serier convergence, for piecewise smooth functions. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)
statement:
fourierdlem115.f $e |- ( ph -> F : RR --> RR ) $.
fourierdlem115.t $e |- T = ( 2 x. _pi ) $.
fourierdlem115.per $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. RR ) -> ( F ` ( x + T ) ) = ( F ` x ) ) $.
fourierdlem115.g $e |- G = ( ( RR _D F ) |` ( -u _pi (,) _pi ) ) $.
fourierdlem115.dmdv $e |- ( ph -> ( ( -u _pi (,) _pi ) \ dom G ) e. Fin ) $.
fourierdlem115.dvcn $e |- ( ph -> G e. ( dom G -cn-> CC ) ) $.
fourierdlem115.rlim $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. ( ( -u _pi [,) _pi ) \ dom G ) ) -> ( ( G |` ( x (,) +oo ) ) limCC x ) =/= (/) ) $.
fourierdlem115.llim $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. ( ( -u _pi (,] _pi ) \ dom G ) ) -> ( ( G |` ( -oo (,) x ) ) limCC x ) =/= (/) ) $.
fourierdlem115.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. RR ) $.
fourierdlem115.l $e |- ( ph -> L e. ( ( F |` ( -oo (,) X ) ) limCC X ) ) $.
fourierdlem115.r $e |- ( ph -> R e. ( ( F |` ( X (,) +oo ) ) limCC X ) ) $.
fourierdlem115.a $e |- A = ( n e. NN0 |-> ( S. ( -u _pi (,) _pi ) ( ( F ` x ) x. ( cos ` ( n x. x ) ) ) _d x / _pi ) ) $.
fourierdlem115.b $e |- B = ( n e. NN |-> ( S. ( -u _pi (,) _pi ) ( ( F ` x ) x. ( sin ` ( n x. x ) ) ) _d x / _pi ) ) $.
fourierdlem115.s $e |- S = ( k e. NN |-> ( ( ( A ` k ) x. ( cos ` ( k x. X ) ) ) + ( ( B ` k ) x. ( sin ` ( k x. X ) ) ) ) ) $.
fourierdlem115 $p |- ( ph -> ( seq 1 ( + , S ) ~~> ( ( ( L + R ) / 2 ) - ( ( A ` 0 ) / 2 ) ) /\ ( ( ( A ` 0 ) / 2 ) + sum_ n e. NN ( ( ( A ` n ) x. ( cos ` ( n x. X ) ) ) + ( ( B ` n ) x. ( sin ` ( n x. X ) ) ) ) ) = ( ( L + R ) / 2 ) ) ) $.
$d A k $.
$d B k $.
$d F k n x $.
$d F k x $.
$d G k $.
$d G k x $.
$d L k $.
$d R k $.
$d T k $.
$d T k x $.
$d X k $.
$d X k n x $.
$d k ph x $.
